function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disparities in essential/non-essential status across states","Impact":"Unequal impact on construction operations and workers","Mitigation":"Aligning state regulations and guidelines for essential construction work","Technologies":"Online collaboration tools for state regulators and industry stakeholders","People":"Construction professionals, site workers, and project managers","Owner":"State governments, construction industry associations"},{"Description":"Material delivery delays and shortage of material","Impact":"Project delays, increased costs, and disruption of supply chain","Mitigation":"Diversifying suppliers, stockpiling critical materials, and adopting alternative construction methods","Technologies":"Supplier tracking systems and alternative material sourcing technology","People":"Construction project managers and supply chain managers","Owner":"Construction companies and material suppliers"},{"Description":"Safety concerns regarding virus spread in workplaces","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implementing strict safety measures, social distancing, and regular testing protocols","Technologies":"Smart wearable devices for social distancing monitoring and contact tracing","People":"Construction workers, site supervisors, and safety officers","Owner":"Construction companies and project owners"}]}
